NEDEN ÖNERMEM ÇÜNKÜ ? ÖNCELİKLE BU OYUN DÜNYANIN EN İYİ FPS SAVAŞ OYUNU VALORAT MALAROT HİKAYE YNAİ HABERİNİZ OLSUN AMA ŞU OYUNA Bİ HİLE SİSTEMİ GETİRREMEDİLER RANK SİSTEMİ DESİZ BOK GİBİ OYUZDEN ALMAYIN

The worst game that exists, despite having a good gameplay, the game developer cares little about the players' experience, a game infested with hack, unfortunately they only think about making money by inventing new skins, boxes, operations, etc. But spending a little of that money that they profit so much to develop a good antihack system doesn't even cross their minds, practically all matches regardless of their rank within the game will always find hackers and will be harmed, wholly non-functional reporting system, because you send several complaints during the game, and after watching the replays and nothing is done. Now if you want to play and have a good experience with that game, you will have to pay to play via FaceIT, Gamers Club, etc. Because their antihack does work, while in the competitive mode of the game there are only gods with silver patents until global, bot movement, but when it comes to shooting and guessing where people are ... Unfortunately the developer abandoned the game and players. Think about it, before any other company creates a game that works with antihack, you will go bankrupt for simply not developing a good antihack.
В этой игре мне нравится динамика игры,настройки и так же мне нравится скины которые украшают инвентарь)
